entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Port Colborne
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow or rain. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow. Periods of rain or snow beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 3 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of snow late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming north 20 late in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
